text: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ

translation.en: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might
translation.id: Allah telah menetapkan, "Aku dan rasul-rasul-Ku pasti menang." Sungguh, Allah Mahakuat, Mahaperkasa
